contentrichtext.text: {{prose|date=March 2008}} {{Infobox person |image = | | | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1971|1|17|mf=y}} | birth_place = [[Hachiōji, Tokyo]], [[Japan]] | occupation = Actress | yearsactive = 1984–present }} {{nihongo|'''Youki Kudoh'''|工藤 夕貴|Kudō Yūki|extra=born January 17, 1971}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[actress]] and [[singer]]. She won the award for best newcomer at the 6th [[Yokohama Film Festival]] for ''[[The Crazy Family]]''.<ref>{{Cite web |url=http://homepage3.nifty.com/yokohama-eigasai/06-1984/06_1984_shou.html |title=第６回ヨコハマ映画祭 １９８４年日本映画個人賞|accessdate= 2010-01-21|language= Japanese |publisher= [[Yokohama Film Festival]]}}</ref> She also won the award for best actress at the 16th [[Hochi Film Award]] for ''[[War and Youth]]''.<ref>{{Cite web |url=http://cinemahochi.yomiuri.co.jp/h_award/1991/ |title= 報知映画賞ヒストリー |accessdate= 2010-01-27|language= Japanese|publisher= Cinema Hochi}}</ref> ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !! Notes |- | [[1984 in film|1984]] ||''[[The Crazy Family]]''<br />(逆噴射家族 ''Gyakufunsha Kazoku'') || Erika Kobayashi || |- |rowspan="2"| [[1985 in film|1985]] || ''Congratulatory Speech''<br />(祝辞 ''Shukuji'') || Fusae Saotome || |- | ''[[Typhoon Club (film)|Typhoon Club]]''<br />(台風クラブ ''Taifū Kurabu'') || Rie Takami || aka ''Taifu Club'' |- | [[1987 in film|1987]] || ''Honba jyoshikō manyuaru: Hatsukoi binetsu-hen''<br />(本場ぢょしこうマニュアル 初恋微熱篇) || Michiko Sawaki || |- |rowspan="2"| [[1988 in film|1988]] || ''Aoi sanmyaku '88''<br />(青い山脈'88) || Shinko Terazawa || |- | ''Labyrinth of Flower Garden''<br />(花園の迷宮 ''Hanazono no meikyū'') || Fuyumi || |- | [[1989 in film|1989]] || ''[[Mystery Train (film)|Mystery Train]]'' || Mitsuko || |- | [[1991 in film|1991]] || ''[[War and Youth]]''<br />(戦争と青春 ''Sensō to Seishun'') || Yukari Hanafusa/Sakiko || |- | [[1994 in film|1994]] || ''[[Picture Bride (film)|Picture Bride]]'' || Riyo || |- | [[1997 in film|1997]] || ''[[Heaven's Burning]]'' || Midori || |- | [[1999 in film|1999]] || ''[[Snow Falling on Cedars (film)|Snow Falling on Cedars]]'' || Hatsue Imada Miyamoto || |- | [[2000 in film|2000]] || ''[[Blood: The Last || ''[[Undeclared]]'' || Kikuki || TV series: episode ''Hal and Hillary'' |- | [[2003 in film|2003]] || ''[[The Wind Carpet]]''<br />(風の絨毯 ''Kaze no Jūtan'') || Kinue Nagai || also Associate Producer gabai-bāchan'') || Mother || |- | ''[[Masters of Horror]]'' || Woman || TV series: episode ''[[Imprint (Masters of Horror episode)|Imprint]]'' |- | [[2007 in film|2007]] || ''[[Rush Hour 3]]'' ||
